title: Player Retention Analytics
text: Retention R package contains datasets related user activity, user details, build versions. datasets can used analyses user retention, activity patterns, impact different build versions user activity. functions simulating builds, users, activity data, customisable control scale data output. core data simulating decrease activity according number days player active. , day 0, 100% chance activity, day 1, 30% chance activity, day 30, small chance activity. mimics player retention data usually shaped. done creating probability function dependent days start activity, sampling binomial distribution. See get_activity_probabilityand get_activity details.
